description.narrative: This activity (Crown Agents Procurement for SAVI) is a component of States Accountability and Voice Initiative (SAVI) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of goods' and a budget of £803,337. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited. The start date is 01-08-2008 and the end date is 01-07-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
